C

ChainCallReceiver - Class in info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.chain_call_receiver
Receiver that calls IReceiverChain chosen by a IChainChoiceStrategy on a message.
ChainCallReceiver(IChainStorage, IChainChoiceStrategy) - Constructor for class info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.chain_call_receiver.ChainCallReceiver
The constructor.
ChainChoiceException - Exception in info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.chain_call_receiver.exceptions
Exception thrown by IChainChoiceStrategy.chooseChain(IMessageProcessor) when it's impossible to choose a chain to call.
ChainChoiceException(String) - Constructor for exception info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.chain_call_receiver.exceptions.ChainChoiceException
Constructor with specific error message as argument
ChainChoiceException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.chain_call_receiver.exceptions.ChainChoiceException
Constructor with specific error message and specific cause as arguments
chooseChain(IMessageProcessor) - Method in interface info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.chain_call_receiver.IChainChoiceStrategy
Choose a chain to be called on the message being processed by given message processor.

I

IChainChoiceStrategy - Interface in info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.chain_call_receiver
Strategy used by ChainCallReceiver to choose what chain to call.
info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.chain_call_receiver - package info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.chain_call_receiver
Contains implementation of a IMessageReceiver that chooses a IReceiverChain for a message and applies it.
info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.chain_call_receiver.exceptions - package info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.chain_call_receiver.exceptions
Contains exceptions thrown by IChainChoiceStrategy.
